title: [Extension Proposal] Rockstar language support

labels.name: area/quarkiverse
labels.description: This issue/PR is part of the Quarkiverse organization

body:
### Description

Interested in this extension, please +1 via the emoji/reaction feature of GitHub (top right).

This extension allows people to run their [Rockstar](https://codewithrockstar.com/) programs with Quarkus. Although I don't expect that this will be something many people need in production, it is useful as an demonstration/example of how to implement extensions.

The code is currently living at https://github.com/holly-cummins/bon-jova-rockstar-implementation/, but Quarkiverse hosting would be beneficial. 

### Repository name

quarkus-bon-jova-rockstar

### Short description

An implementation of Rockstar as a JVM language 

### Repository Homepage URL

https://quarkiverse.github.io/quarkiverse-docs/quarkus-bon-jova-rockstar/dev/

### Repository Topics

- quarkus-extension
- 
...


### Team Members

- @holly-cummins 
[- @hannotify](https://github.com/hannotify)


### Additional context

See also https://hollycummins.com/rockstar-jfokus/

Since this is an [existing repo](https://github.com/holly-cummins/bon-jova-rockstar-implementation) that I'm hoping we can bring over, that might affect the creation process?
